sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Typography, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TableBody, TableContainer, Table, makeStyles, Paper, TextField, InputAdornment, Button, Fab, Drawer, } from "@material-ui/core"; import EditIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Edit"; import AddIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Add"; import SearchIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Search"; import formatMoney from "../lib/formatMoney"; import { gql, useQuery } from "@apollo/client"; import { useState } from "react"; const query = gql` query($limit: Int) { allCustomers(first: $limit) { id name phone address } } `; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { padding: theme.spacing(2), marginBottom: theme.spacing(2), maxWidth: 500, }, })); export default function Customer() { const classes = useStyles(); const [drawer, setDrawer] = useState(false); const [name, setName] = useState(); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(); const [address, setAddress] = useState(); let { data, loading, error, fetchMore, refetch } = useQuery(query, { variables: { limit: 6 }, }); let allCustomers = data?.allCustomers; return ( setDrawer(true)} > setDrawer(false)}> Tên Điện thoại Địa chỉ {allCustomers?.length ? allCustomers.map((customer) => ( {}}> {customer.name} {customer.phone} {customer.address} )) : null}
); }
